author: Tom Carreras, AI Boost
title: BitFuFu Hits Record 34.1 EH/s Hashrate as Bitcoin Production Surges in May
description: The mining firm also sold 178 BTC near May’s price peak to cover expenses and boost liquidity.
content:
Bitcoin mining firm BitFuFu posted a record-setting month in May, boosting its hashrate under management to 34.1 exahashes per second (EH/s) and producing 400 BTC, up 91% from April.
Most of that pr… [+1085 chars]
